mapper.select: SELECT id ,parent_id ,menu_cd ,menu_name ,menu_url ,list_order FROM MENU_TBL ORDER BY list_order ASC;

WITH RECURSIVE TREE_MENU_TBL(id ,parent_id ,menu_cd ,menu_name ,menu_url ,list_order ,LEVEL ,PATH ,CYCLE) AS (SELECT mt.id ,mt.parent_id ,mt.menu_cd ,mt.menu_name ,mt.menu_url ,mt.list_order ,0 ,ARRAY [mt.id] ,FALSE FROM MENU_TBL AS mt WHERE mt.parent_id IS NULL OR mt.parent_id = 0 UNION ALL SELECT mt.id ,mt.parent_id ,mt.menu_cd ,mt.menu_name ,mt.menu_url ,mt.list_order ,LEVEL+1 ,PATH || mt.id ,mt.id = ANY(PATH) FROM MENU_TBL AS mt JOIN TREE_MENU_TBL AS tree ON mt.parent_id = tree.id WHERE mt.parent_id = tree.id AND NOT CYCLE) SELECT id ,parent_id ,menu_cd ,REPLACE(LPAD('', LEVEL) || menu_name,' ','ã„´')AS MENU_NAME ,menu_url ,list_order ,LEVEL ,PATH FROM TREE_MENU_TBL ORDER BY parent_id, list_order ASC;
